N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 519.7 - Request for a hearing

State Regulations
(a) Any clear, written communication to the
department by or on behalf of a person requesting review of a department's
final determination is a request for a hearing if made within 60 days of the
date of the department's written determination. (b) A hearing may be requested by writing: New York State Department of Social Services

Bureau of Special Hearings
40 N. Pearl Street

Albany, NY 12243
